name: S'mores Nutella® Bars
author: Toni
summary: Rich and easy s'mores bars with Nutella®.
ingredients: ½ cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a 9x13-inch baking pan with aluminum foil, leaving a 2-inch overhang on 2 sides
Break graham crackers into the bowl of a food processor
Add melted butter and sugar; process until mixture resembles wet sand
Pour graham cracker mixture into the prepared baking pan
Press down flat using the bottom of a glass
Bake in the preheated oven until crust is set, 12 to 15 minutes
Place chocolate chips in the top of a double boiler over simmering water
Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted, about 5 minutes
Mix in chocolate-hazelnut spread and cinnamon
Pour chocolate mixture over the crust; level out with a spoon
Press marshmallows into the chocolate, covering it completely
Place baking pan in the refrigerator until chocolate firms up, about 2 hours
Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Toast marshmallows under the broiler for 1 to 2 minutes
